manuscript_citation: Aw WC, Towarnicki SG, Melvin RG, Youngson NA, Garvin MR, Hu Y, Nielsen S, Thomas T, Pickford R, Bustamante S, Vila-Sanjurjo A, Smyth GK, Ballard JWO (2018) Genotype to phenotype: Diet-by-mitochondrial DNA haplotype interactions drive metabolic flexibility and organismal fitness. PLoS Genet 14(11): e1007735. doi: 10.1371/journal.pgen.1007735

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"cskev","text":"Weigh out agar 1 g per 100 ml of food to be prepared","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56i1f","text":"Weigh out 0.022 g sugar, 2.719 g treacle, 7.938 g yeast and 7.321 g semolina per 100 ml of food for the 1:2 P:C diet, or 0.934 g sugar, 14.596 g treacle, 1.285 g yeast and 1.185 g semolina per 100 ml of food for the 1:16 P:C diet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5ce9","text":"Measure out water into large beaker, add small amount from large beaker to separate beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bmch","text":"Add semolina to the small beaker and stir to ensure semolina is hydrated, leave aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bkqdu","text":"Add agar and sugar to large beaker and mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21hl2","text":"Mark the volume on the beaker in pen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dj059","text":"Place in microwave and bring to boil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4v4q2","text":"Add treacle to large beaker, mix, and bring to boil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m1or","text":"Add yeast to large beaker, mix, and bring to boil, continue heating until mixture stops over-boiling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a8k8d","text":"Once the food will not boil over, add water to marked level to maintain the correct volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fgng","text":"Boil for 10 minutes, mixing every 3 minutes, adding water to maintain volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9njpm","text":"Remove food from microwave and allow mixture to cool to 70oC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":58,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fdb3u","text":"Add semolina","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6so9m","text":"Allow food to cool to 60oC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":24,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ouuk","text":"Add 1ml of 10% propionic acid, 1 ml of 1% phosphoric acid, and 0.4 ml of 25% nipagin dissolved in 100% ethanol per 100ml of food cooked","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ddr8","text":"Stir until semolina maintains suspension in the food","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27lqq","text":"Pour 25 ml of food per bottle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frsd0","text":"Ensure semolina maintains suspension in the food mixture, stirring the food in the bottle if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"odvn","text":"Leave food to set and cool for 2 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8o66j","text":"Store food for no more than 1 week","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
